paragraphs.content: Neither shall they say, Lo, here! or, Lo, there! For, behold, the kingdom of God has already come unto you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Neither shall they say, Lo, here! or, Lo, there! For, behold, the kingdom of God has already come unto you.

paragraphs.content: And they answered and said unto him, Where, Lord, shall they be taken?
paragraphs.contentHtml: And they answered and said unto him, Where, Lord, shall they be taken?

paragraphs.content: And he said unto them, Wheresoever the body is gathered; or, in other words, whithersoever the saints are gathered, thither will the eagles be gathered together; or, thither will the remainder be gathered together.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he said unto them, Wheresoever the body is gathered; or, in other words, whithersoever the saints are gathered, thither will the eagles be gathered together; or, thither will the remainder be gathered together.

paragraphs.content: This he spake, signifying the gathering of his saints; and of angels descending and gathering the remainder unto them; the one from the bed, the other from the grinding, and the other from the field, whithersoever he listeth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: This he spake, signifying the gathering of his saints; and of angels descending and gathering the remainder unto them; the one from the bed, the other from the grinding, and the other from the field, whithersoever he listeth.

paragraphs.content: For verily there shall be new heavens, and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For verily there shall be new heavens, and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness.

paragraphs.content: And there shall be no unclean thing; for the earth becoming old, even as a garment, having waxed in corruption, wherefore it vanisheth away, and the footstool remaineth sanctified, cleansed from all sin.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And there shall be no unclean thing; for the earth becoming old, even as a garment, having waxed in corruption, wherefore it vanisheth away, and the footstool remaineth sanctified, cleansed from all sin.
